subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: We (ARPCC) are playing the VP role in Colibri - European Platform for Joint Custody, Coparenting and Childhood.  AS this is a non-official organization we registered as ARPCC in this registry. A separate registration will follow if Colibri will be registered officially
goals__remit: Child Protection, Parental equality, Parental Responsibility,  Protection of the children against abuse, Protection of the Victims of Family Violence (with focus on children violence)
relevant_communication:
1) Participated to the 9th European Forum for Children Rights, in June 2015 
2) We play the VP role of Colibri Federation (Colibri is a federation of not-for-profit organizations which work for implementing the parental equality practice in Europe) 
3) Participant to the 2nd International Shared Parenting Conference in Bonn, in December 2015
